item.description:
This workshop is happening. There are many who have registered outside of this meetup.

This is an advanced workshop for couples only.

Please email me with your prior experience before signing up, so that we can create the internal and external safety required for this level of work.

This will be a clothing-optional exploration of expanding your erotic energy body and orgasmic potential.


  • Unlock and channel your potent sexual energy and aliveness
  • Harmonize your energy with your partner
  • Experience the transcendent power of tapping into the group energy field
  • Learn techniques to experience full-body orgasms
  • Discover the key to becoming multi-orgasmic – whether you are a man or a woman!
  • Learn techniques to separate orgasm from ejaculation in men


Open only to couples. You must sign up with a partner to participate.

Location: a private home in Newton. The address will be emailed to confirmed registrants.
Cost: $120/couple by 3/16, $140 thereafter

Time: 3-6pm. Followed by optional potluck dinner.

Ron Isenstein, a Certified Watsu Practitioner, will be offering discounted introductory Watsu sessions following the workshop at $25/20 minutes.

Ron has been practicing Watsu since 1992 and has been a Watsu® Therapist since 1997. He compliments his aquatic bodywork with his trainings as a Reiki Master and a Shiatsu practioner, having studied Zen Shiatsu with Masters such as Harold Dull, Shinzo Fujimaki, Ohashi, and Kikuko Miyazaki. Ron brings to his work the gift of an open and loving heart that is felt by all. As one client wrote, “Ron’s big heart beat made me feel nurtured and held by Spirit Father." Ron's love for the work has always come from his ability to give and share this heart space with others.

To see a Watsu session go to http://www.youtube.co...

Please email me with any questions.
item.how_to_find_us: Address of private home in Newton will be emailed to confirmed registrants.
item.name: Sacred Erotic Fire
